sourcesContent:
import { all, call } from 'redux-saga/effects'
import { shopSaga } from './shop/shop.saga'
import { userSaga } from './user/user.saga'
import { cartSaga } from './cart/cart.saga'

export default function* rootSaga() {
    yield all([
        call(shopSaga),
        call(userSaga),
        call(cartSaga)
    ])
}
